"Msg" in response body is "successfully added"

elements.name: Verify Book is getting retrieved using invalid getBookByID API

steps.name: Invalid BookID is given
User calls "getBookByID" API with "GET" HTTP request
The API call is success with status 404

arguments.val: The book by requested bookid / author name does not exists!

elements.name: Verify if Delete Book functionality is working

steps.name: DeleteBook Payload
User calls "deleteBook" API with "POST" HTTP request
The API call is success with status 200
"msg" in response body is "book is successfully deleted"
